issue.title: [C++] Store type_code information in UnionScalar::value
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9434](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9434). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The format allows duplicated types in unions, so in order to properly construct an array from a unionscalar we need to know which type to use. Currently we only store the value as another scalar.
